title: 140 - Get This Phlebotomy Out-A-Me
description:
Love lingers as the Hawkins couples discuss their romantic origin stories. Tim forces Luke to issue an apology to all women for his offensive jokes.  Livy uses every spare tire in the St. Louis metro area. Heather, much like Nike, just does it. Oh, and more rapping!
